title: Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier, 1 gallon, Black; low tank indicator; Dish washer safe; Humidity capacity: 142ml/h; Aroma tray; 3 speeds; mechanical knob; covers 320 sq. ft. area, weight: 6.33 lbs
descriptions:
Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier, 1 gallon, Black

Breathe easier and feel more comfortable at home. This simple, reliable humidifier adds gentle moisture to the air to help with dry skin, scratchy throats, and winter stuffiness.

Easy to use
- One simple knob: Turn it to choose Low, Medium, or High mist. No apps, no touch screens.
- Clear light for low water: A small light lets you know when it’s time to refill.
- Safe to run: It turns off automatically when the tank is empty.

Easy to clean
- The water tank and parts are dishwasher-safe (top rack), so cleaning is quick and simple.
- Uses an affordable replacement filter: BestAir H62.

Comfortable and quiet
- Cool mist evaporative technology feels natural and gentle.
- Quiet operation for bedrooms and living rooms.
- Covers up to 320 square feet—great for most bedrooms or a den.

Handy features
- 1-gallon tank for many hours of moisture.
- Aroma tray: Add your favorite essential oil to the tray (not the water) for a light, pleasant scent.
- Lightweight design: About 6.3 lb, easy to move from room to room.
- Sturdy black finish that blends with any décor.

What you do
1) Fill the 1-gallon tank with clean tap water and place it back on the base.  
2) Turn the knob to choose your mist level.  
3) When the light shows low water, refill the tank.  
4) Clean weekly; parts go in the dishwasher for convenience.

Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier—simple comfort, clear air, and easy care for your home.
